column4: i spend more time in windows than linux, but i blame my WOW addiction
im having a problem when i boot off the disk it gets an error reading a specific sector
it eventually boots to the desk but then the installer crashes
I play WOW on Windows @ 1280x1024 with every setting cranked
hope i can do that under wine/cedega :)
lets hope you arent running the 64bit version of ubuntu :)
just use the 32bit version - you dont have more than 4GB ram do you?
3 gigs, but thats addressable under 32 bit
you know how chip fab works right
if it runs stable at an overclocked speed, odds are, it can handle it :)
yes, but your definition of stable is likely very different from mine
they often take higher chips and relabel them lower to meet supplier demands
Ive run PRIME95 for 24 hours consecitively, BurnInTest Pro for 12 hours
again, our definitions most likely differ
its stable for daily usage, and for that i cant complain
